name: Recruitment for the Post of Veterinary Inspector

details.description: SSSB Punjab invites applications for the post of Veterinary Inspector. Candidates with a diploma in Veterinary Science and Animal Health Technology are encouraged to apply.
details.eligibility: Diploma in Veterinary Science and Animal Health Technology from a recognized institution.
details.selection_process: The selection process includes a written examination followed by document verification.

name: Recruitment for the Post of Junior Draftsman (Civil)

details.description: SSSB Punjab invites applications for the post of Junior Draftsman (Civil). Candidates with a diploma in Civil Engineering are encouraged to apply.
details.eligibility: Diploma in Civil Engineering from a recognized institution.
details.selection_process: The selection process includes a written examination followed by document verification.
